thread.title: Chico Fierro jailed for murdering Karyna Rodriguez during rough sex | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chico Fierro jailed for murdering Karyna Rodriguez during rough sex | Metro News

author: Tomeyjes For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chico Fierro jailed for murdering Karyna Rodriguez during rough sex | Metro News
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 8:15 am Chico Fieroo, 26, has been sentenced to 25 years in prison (Picture: El Paso Police Department) 
A student has been jailed for 25 years for murdering his girlfriend during rough sex on Valentine’s Day. 
Chico Fierro, 26, pleaded guilty to killing Karyna Rodriguez in 2015 following a night of drinking, in which he also took pictures of her unconscious body covered in blood. Who is this man seen walking away from where bodies of two girls were found? 
Rodriguez had told police that he and his girlfriend had ‘rough sex’ and then had fallen asleep but officers later found photos on his phone of her lying on the mattress surrounded by blood. 
Ms Rodriguez, who was also a student at New Mexico State University, was found in an apartment at midday the following day. 
A preliminary autopsy determined she bled to death from severe internal injuries that apparently took place during sex, the El Paso Times reported. Fierro was jailed at 384th District Court (Picture: Google Maps) 
During a bond hearing in 2015, the defendants lawyer Thomas D. Carter IV explained the pair were ‘in love’ but had engaged in consensual but rough sex. 
But prosecutors told the court that many of Fierro’s ex-girlfriends had told investigators that he had a tendency for using objects during sex. 
Fierro, who also worked as a personal trainer while studying at the University of Texas, had charges of aggravated assault with a weapon dismissed. More
